entry.title: Cut and Run
entry.summary:
Author: Bubbling24

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,797Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 266

Summary: In a city like Gotham, information is currency. And you've made a career out of getting people to talk.Not by force. Not with threats. Just a salon chair, a mirror, and the kind of silence that makes people fill it with secrets. Affairs. Deals. Who‚Äôs moving into which block. Who‚Äôs gone missing. Who‚Äôs about to.You‚Äôre not a vigilante. You don‚Äôt wear a mask. You just know when something‚Äôs about to crack - and lately, Gotham‚Äôs been humming like a live wire.And you weren‚Äôt supposed to matter. Not to anyone.And especially not to the man who just blew up a bar because you said it gave you a bad feeling.

entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,926Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 50

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you‚Äôve known you‚Äôd marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family‚Äôs legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden‚Äïit was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father‚Äïjoin your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne‚Äôs adopted ‚Äògolden son,‚Äô Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he‚Äôs nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick‚Äôs bodyguard, Jason Todd‚Äïa reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne‚Äôs‚Äïeverything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren‚Äôt allowed to have.And now, he‚Äôs suddenly everything you want.

entry.title: Chromatic silence
entry.summary:
Author: corpsedogs

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,050Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 230

Summary: And then.. it happens. Your world explodes.Just a single brief touch. It didn‚Äôt even last a second, but that‚Äôs all it took.The color rushes in and you inhale sharply.Jason.. he was all red and shadows, his hoodie the deepest rust and his skin warm in the golden lamplight. You blink, nearly stumbling as you grab the railing like it‚Äôll hold your sanity in place.But then you looked at Jason, staring at the distance like nothing happened.You internally panicked.He doesn‚Äôt see it.He doesn‚Äôt feel it.¬†A.K.A The reader‚Äôs soulmate power is to see colors for the first time when she touches her soulmate. When she met Jason, her world bursts to color but not his. She fell for him quietly, but she‚Äôs not his and she‚Äôs torn between waiting for his colors to come or moving on.

entry.title: The Star that Wouldn't Die
entry.summary:
Author: ShadDork

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,197Chapters: 13/25Kudos: 201

Summary: Jason Todd forgot a lot of things after the lazarus pit's putrid green waters helped restore him back to life. Most of it was unimportant information, things that he didn't need to worry about, after all, he could always relearn names, smells, and re-read books. Lost memories weren't as easy to deal with the loss of, but he could always make new ones. The memories that remained were largely traumatic, and the others were slowly being uncovered as time passed.He wished that Dick hadn't said that name, your name. Reigniting feelings and memories. Guilt was already a large part of his existence, and this new guilt about forgetting you entirely was just making everything worse. He shouldn't track you down in case it accidentally put you in danger. But he wanted to make sure that you were okay. It was a battle he lost against himself.As memories he thought were long lost start to return, can he continue to be in your life without dragging you down with him? Can he be in your life without you knowing who he is? He doesn't know, but he wants to try.

entry.title: May a Thousand Blossoms Bloom
entry.summary:
Author: ovenbaked_seasalt_cracker

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,276Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 19

Summary: "Does my body make you uncomfortable, Jason?"A cough breaks from his lips, shaking his body as he bends away from you, thumping a fist on his chest."No, no, I--it's just not very common in Gotham for people to go... bare."You catch yourself leaning into his space, and reel yourself back. A small smile plays on your lips at his words. "I didn't know immortal beings were so shy around the natural body. I apologise my lord, I shall cover myself."--Being a flower nymph who stays in the wooded meadow you were born, it isn't everyday you come face-to-face with a man, much less one that crash lands in your forest...-Banned from Gotham, Jason the God of Destruction wakes up in a Lonely Forest far from civilization and stripped of his godly powers. He soon finds himself welcomed into a world filled with Nymphs, and mythical creatures. Will he find a budding love? How will he get his godhood back? All he knows is that there is a semi-naked woman watching his every move as he nurses himself back to health in this meadow.
